price: Dhugumatti Rabbiin dhaga'eera jecha ishee siin falmituu waa'ee abbaa manaa ishee keessatti, tan gara Rabbiitti himannaa dhiyeeffattuu (dhagayeera). Rabbiin falmii keessan lamaan ni dhaga'a. Rabbiin dhagayaa, argaadha.{1}
arabic: قَدۡ سَمِعَ ٱللَّهُ قَوۡلَ ٱلَّتِي تُجَٰدِلُكَ فِي زَوۡجِهَا وَتَشۡتَكِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ يَسۡمَعُ تَحَاوُرَكُمَآۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٌ
footnotes: {1} intalti sun kowla binti sa'ilabaa jedhamti. jaarsa isii owsi binu ssaamit Nabitti himatte. kana Rabbiin dubbate.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qad samiʿa al-lahu qawla allatī tujādiluka fī zawjihā watashtakī ilā al-lahi wal-lahu yasmaʿu taḥāwurakumā inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
